}else{alert("username error!");}}).catch(fail=>console.log(fail));};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"main"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"container"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(HeaderTop,{isLogin:false,isInLoginPage:true}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"form-signIn"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("form",{action:"",className:"form-container",onSubmit:handleClick},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",{className:"form-title"},"Sign In"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",{className:"username"},"Username"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Input,{type:"text",name:"txtUserName"}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Button,{primary:true,type:"submit"},"Sign In")))));}export default SignIn;
